title: Wives, Submit To Your Husbands
itunes:title: Wives, Submit To Your Husbands
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 28 years old and my fiancé is 35. We have a baby on the way and I recently moved across the country to be with him. Now that I’m living in his home, I’m not sure that I am making the right choice and I’m questioning whether or not I should marry him. When it comes to his family, there is an open door policy with his family. They come and go as they please and his sister has a key to our house...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 28 years old and my fiancé is 35. We have a baby on the way and I recently moved across the country to be with him. Now that I’m living in his home, I’m not sure that I am making the right choice and I’m questioning whether or not I should marry him. When it comes to his family, there is an open door policy with his family. They come and go as they please and his sister has a key to our house...............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
